Verses: 1 leviyaraagiya Aasaariyarukkum Levikoththiraththaar Anaivarukkum Isravel Puththirarudan Pangum Sudhandharamum Illaadhiruppadhaaga; Karththarukku Idappadum Dhaganabaligalaiyum Avarukkuch Sudhandharamaanavaigalaiyum Avargal Pusippaargalaaga.
2 avargal Sagodhararukkulle Avargalukkuch Sudhandharamillai; Karththar Avargalukkuch Solliyabadiye, Avare Avargal Sudhandharam.
3 janaththinidaththil Petrukkolla Vendiya Aasaariyarukkuriya Varaththaavadhu: Janangal Baliyidum Aadumaadugalil Munnandhodaiyaiyum Thaadaigalaiyum Iraippaiyaiyum Aasaariyanukkuk Kodukkavendum.
4 un Dhaaniyam, Thiraatcharasam, Enney, Aatturomam Ennum Ivaigalin Mudharbalanaiyum Avanukkuk Kodukkavendum.
5 avanum Avan Kumaararum Ennaalum Karththarin Naamaththai Munnittu Aaraadhanai Seyyumbadi Nirkumporuttu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Un Koththiraththaar Ellaarukkullum Avanaiye Therindhukondaar.
6 isravelil Evvidaththilumulla Un Vaasalgal Yaadhondrile Thangina Oru Leviyan Avvidaththai Vittu, Karththar Therindhukonda Sthaanaththirku Manappoorvamaai Vandhaal,
7 ange Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Nirkum Leviyaraagiya Than Ellaach Sagodhararaippolum Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Naamaththai Munnittu Oozhiyanjeyvaan.
8 appadippattavargal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Aasthiyin Vilaikkirayaththai Anubavikkiradhum Allaamal, Saappaattirkaagach Samamaana Paagaththaiyum Petrukkolvaargal.
9 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththil Nee Poich Serum Podhu, Andha Jaadhigal Seyyum Aruvaruppugalinbadi Seyyak Katruk Kollavendaam.
10 than Maganaiyaavadhu Than Magalaiyaavadhu Theekkadakkappannugiravanum, Kurisollugiravanum, Naalpaarkkiravanum, Anjanam Paarkkiravanum, Sooniyakkaaranum,
11 mandhiravaadhiyum, Sannadhakkaaranum, Maayaviththaikkaaranum, Seththavargalidaththil Kuriketkiravanum Ungalukkulle Irukkavendaam.
12 ippadippattavaigalaich Seygiravan Evanum Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavan; Ippadippatta Aruvaruppugalin Nimiththam Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Un Munnindru Thuraththividugiraar.
13 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Nee Uththamanaayirukkakkadavaai.
14 nee Thuraththividappogira Indha Jaadhigal Naal Paarkkiravargalukkum Kuri Sollugiravargalukkum Sevikodukkiraargal; Nee Appadich Seygiradharku Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uththaravukodaar.
15 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ennaip Pola Oru Theerkkadharisiyai Unakkaaga Un Naduve Un Sagodhararilirundhu Ezhumbap Pannuvaar; Avarukkuch Sevikoduppeergalaaga.

16 orepile Sabai Koottappattanaalil: Naan Saagaadhabadi En Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththai Ini Naan Kelaamalum, Indhap Periya Akkiniyai Ini Naan Kaanaamalum Iruppenaaga Endru Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nee Vendik Kondadhinbadiyellaam Avar Seyvaar.
17 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Avargal Sonnadhu Sariye.

18 unnaippola Oru Theerkkadharisiyai Naan Avargalukkaaga Avargal Sagodhararilirundhu Ezhumbappanni, En Vaarththaigalai Avar Vaayil Aruluven; Naan Avarukkuk Karpippadhaiyellaam Avargalukkuch Solluvaar.
19 en Naamaththinaale Avar Sollum En Vaarththaigalukkuch Sevikodaadhavan Evano Avanai Naan Visaarippen.
20 sollumbadi Naan Kattalaiyidaadha Vaarththaiyai En Naamaththinaale Sollath Thuniyum Theerkkadharisiyum, Vere Dhevargalin Naamaththinaale Pesum Theerkkadharisiyum Saagakkadavan.
21 karththar Sollaadha Vaarththai Innadhendru Naan Eppadi Ariven Endru Nee Un Irudhayaththil Solvaayaagil,

22 oru Theerkkadharisi Karththarin Naamaththinaale Sollum Kaariyam Nadavaamalum Niraiveraamalum Ponaal, Adhu Karththar Sollaadha Vaarththai; Andhath Theerkkadharisi Adhaith Thunikaraththinaal Sonnaan; Avanukku Nee Bayappadavendaam.
